description:
We had to wait for it kinda long but now it is available - the operating system Mac OS X Yosemite. It is an operating system with lots of features and tools you cannot find at a first glance. That is by reason: even as an unexperienced Mac User you should have a good experience with your OS and get easily along with it. But it really can’t be wrong to dig in a bit deeper and learn more about all the great tools you already have on board.

Mac OS X Yosemite has so many tools on board that you do not need to install a lot of software additionally. From creating PDFs to sorting your bookmarks or adapting the Mac OS X Yosemite background and screensaver, it´s all in already.

The Mac OS X Yosemite Quicktips 2 Course is a colourful mix of all programs Mac OS X comes with. Each tip will give you something new which will result in this special “Aha” moment and leaves you amazed how easy it is to understand your Mac OS X Yosemite better, step-by-step.

Who doesn’t want to be able to help himself when the computer is running slow, you have forgotten a password or simply do a screenshot?

With these 20 Tips in the Mac OS X Yosemite Quicktips 2 course you will not just learn that but much more. Because each single tip shows not just new features of the operating system but also the possibilities it comes with. This way, the beginner gets over his fear to simply try out the features of the system - there is nothing that can go wrong.

Our course, Mac OS X Yosemite Quicktips 2, also helps you to work more effectively. We show you some productivity tools which help you to get rid of the chaos on your desk. We look at the program Stickies as well as the Notification Center which helps you to get an overview of all and everything you need to know - if you know how to set that up.

And even if you do not like typing that much, we will show you how to make your Mac understand your words.
title: Mac OS X Quicktips 2 English
